Key: Hmm... Where did Maria go...

She's not here... She should still be inside the
school, right? She did say she was going to
observe it today...
I don't think she'd be here...
—Oh, there she is. Hey, Maria...
Oh, Shido Itsuka. This is a good place, isn't it?
The way you're talking. You're...

I haven't seen you since yesterday, Shido Itsuka.
Hehe, so you've started to call her Maria, have
you?

You... or, maybe it wasn't you... but she wanted
to be called by another name.
I see. But isn't it confusing with both names?
Well, but...

I told you yesterday. I am Arusu. Arusu. So, Shido
Itsuka, can you call me that?
Okay, Arusu...

Yes, that's right. I am Arusu. Ahaha... I wonder
why. It's become fun. Almost to the point that
it's not enough.
What do you mean by that...

Oh, there you are. I heard you were heading up to
the rooftop, so I wanted to talk to you—
—Sorry, you're in the way.
T-Tonomachi...? He disappeared?!

(That light... Did Arusu really do that? Tonomachi
disappeared as if he were broken up into light
particles.)
H-Hey! What was that?!

Hahaha! Just the opening act. The people in this
world disappear so easily.
What the hell?! What did you do to Tonomachi?!

What are you mad about? What's the point in
getting hysterical over an NPC? It's just a
program.
But, he's alive here like in the real world—
—Huh? What happened to me...?
Tonomachi?! Are you okay?!

Huh? What? Oh yeah, I thought I had something to
tell you... Oh well, guess I'll head back to the
classroom.
So... nothing's wrong with him?

Obviously. He's just a program. It's easy to
recover the data. Wasn't that fun?

Of course it's not fun to see your friend just
disappear into thin air!
Are you some kind of hero of justice?

That's not what I mean, but... I think what you
did was definitely wrong.

But I won't apologize. There's nothing that can't
be done in this world.

That's not true! This world is no different from
reality!

No need to be so naïve about it.
...I think it's almost time.
...Time?

Yup. Time for something fun to happen. Hurry up
and tell the other one what love or whatever is.
What are you talking about—

I'm waiting for it too. I'm sure you'll
understand then.
Hey, wait!

Now take a step forward, Shido Itsuka. Who will
you choose today?
